example.text: One of my top priorities that I outlined during my campaign was to restore accountability and integrity to the federal government. Unchecked power has yielded disastrous results--from the botched Afghanistan withdrawl to the border crisis to Hunter Biden and the White House's ballooning classified documents crisis.
Madam Chair, my colleague's amendment states an obvious fact: It is the responsibility of both the President and the House of Representatives to combat inflation. I have no quarrel with that.
CONTACT ME This week, I introduced my first bill, Lakes Before Turbines Act . Check out the clip below!

Case in point: the New York Farm Labor Board's enactment this week reducing the overtime threshold that will bankrupt many farms. This punitive regulation was driven by woke NYC interests who have no understanding of farm operations.

What concerns you the most? Economy and Inflation Home Heating Costs Crime Crisis At Our Southern Border Prescription Drugs and Health Care Taking this survey will sign you up for future news and updates from my office.

The select committee on China established by House Republicans is more important than ever and we must start treating China's actions with the seriousness they deserve. We must put an end to weak and feckless foreign policy and return to our time-tested mantra of peace through strength.

To cut to the chase, this bill does something very simple -- any developers who choose to pursue wind farm construction on our beautiful Great Lakes will no longer have access to the Federal investment tax credit for those projects. Dunkirk Observer: Langworthy aims to protect 'gem' from turbines WGRZ: With GOP in charge, Langworthy may have role in potential congressional investigations Jamestown Post Journal: Congressman Nick Langworthy Appointed To House Agriculture Committee TapInto Greater Olean: Rep. Nick Langworthy Named to House Oversight Committee Chautauqua Today: Langworthy looking forward to committee assignments I hosted my first town hall this week and spoke with over 4,000 constituents about various topics that are weighing heavy on their minds from the high energy bills to inflation and government spending.
